sentences.sContent: It is small dumpling balls made of glutinousrice flour with rose petals, sesame, bean paste, jujube paste, walnut meat, dried fruit, sugar and edible oil as filling.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is small dumpling balls made of glutinousrice flour with rose petals, sesame, bean paste, jujube paste, walnut meat, dried fruit, sugar and edible oil as filling.
sentences.sCn: “元宵”还有另外一个名字—汤圆，用糯米粉做皮，玫瑰花瓣、芝麻、豆酱、枣泥、胡桃肉、干果、糖和食用油做馅，做成的小面球团。

sentences.sContent: Fillings may be sweet with skinless mung beans, red bean paste and dates, or savory with Chinese sausage, barbecue pork, mushrooms, chestnuts, seafood, eggs and so on. Each flavor tastes delicious.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fillings may be sweet with skinless mung beans, red bean paste and dates, or savory with Chinese sausage, barbecue pork, mushrooms, chestnuts, seafood, eggs and so on. Each flavor tastes delicious.
sentences.sCn: 就口味而言，有绿豆馅、红豆馅、枣泥馅、腊肠馅、腊肉馅、蘑菇馅、栗子馅、海味馅、蛋黄馅等，各具特色，美味十足。

sentences.sContent: Don’t worry though; there are no surprises in Zongzi. They are just rice with either meat or sweet red bean paste wrapped inside.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don’t worry though; there are no surprises in Zongzi. They are just rice with either meat or sweet red bean paste wrapped inside.
sentences.sCn: 不过别担心，粽子里面没什么特别的东西，只是米饭包着肉或豆沙而已。
